content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1534441737051{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Download Notice of Arbitration (PDF).

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

ADR CHAMBERS
NOTICE OF ARBITRATION

Please complete this form after reviewing Rule 3.1 of the ADR Chambers Arbitration Rules.

Return the completed form with the non-refundable filing fee of $500 to:

ADR Chambers
180 Duncan Mill Road, 4th Floor
Toronto, ON M3B 1Z6

Claimant

-and-

Respondent

Date

 Claimant’s Representative or Claimant
TO: Respondent’s Representative or Respondent
AND TO: ADR Chambers
180 Duncan Mill Road, 4th Floor
Toronto, ON M3B 1Z6

NOTICE OF ARBITRATION

TO THE RESPONDENT:

The Claimant hereby gives notice to the Respondent of its intention to commence arbitration proceedings pursuant to the following arbitration clause or agreement or contract:

NATURE OF THE DISPUTE AND MATERIAL FACTS BEING RELIED ON:

ISSUES:

BASIS UPON WHICH ADR CHAMBERS HAS JURISDICTION TO DETERMINE DISPUTE:

REFLIEF CLAIMED:

PROPOSALS AS TO NUMBER OF ARBITRATORS, MEANS OF CONSTITUTING ARBITRAL TRIBUNAL, PLACE OF ARBITRATION, AND LANGUAGE OF ARBITRATION:

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_btn title=”Book an Arbitration” style=”custom” custom_background=”#dd0046″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-calendar” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fadrchambers.com%2Frequest-a-neutral%2F|||”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”153″][vc_custom_heading text=”Regular Arbitration” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”68″][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”72″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
